name: Go Up!
description:
Climb your way from the depths of the underground to the top of a summit and retrieve the treasure! In this simple and pleasant game, explore a desolate, yet peaceful landscape on your way to ascend up the mountain. Platform, jump, and scale your way through 5 unique levels to the top!

Credits

Carlos Arrazola - Level Design

Michael Baker - Programming/Mechanics

SunnyLand Woods - Assets (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/sunnyland-woods-129708)

Sunny Land Forest - Assets (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/sunny-land-forest-108124)

Mine Tileset - Assets (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/mine-tileset-43476)

Warped Caves - Assets (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/warped-caves-103250)
